properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 2:14PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and seas 10 to 15 feet at 10 seconds
expected. For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and
hazardous seas 24 to 29 feet at 16 seconds expected.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 10 PM PST Friday.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM Friday to 4 AM PST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY
